title: Incident postmortem — INC-2026-0042
description: Write postmortem for Saturday Feb 8 production outage. Due before 2pm all-hands Monday.
notes: 8-hour outage (2am-10am). DB connection pool exhaustion caused by auto-scaling deploy.

title: Add DB connection limit check to deploy pipeline
description: Add an automated check to the deploy pipeline that validates connection pool math before any scaling change.
notes: Created after INC-2026-0042. PR #412 triggered outage because no connection limit check existed.

title: Implement connection pool scaling policy
description: Create an automated policy that adjusts DB connection pool limits when pod count changes. Originally from November incident (INC-2025-0089) — never completed.
notes: RECURRING: This was an action item from INC-2025-0089 (November 2025). Never prioritized. Now caused a second outage.

title: Add connection pool utilization alerting
description: Set up alerting when DB connection pool utilization exceeds 80%. Currently no alert until 100% (outage).
notes: We only got alerted at 100% utilization. Need earlier warning.
